ENERGY TAX REFORM ACT

SECTION 1. SHORT TITLE.
This Act may be cited as the "Energy Tax Reform Act of 2024".

SECTION 2. FOSSIL FUEL GENERATION TAX.
2.1 An annual tax of $50 per megawatt shall be assessed on all fossil fuel generation facilities exceeding 50 megawatts capacity.
2.2 Tax shall be collected quarterly by the State Energy Commission.
2.3 Facilities may apply for exemptions under Section 3.

SECTION 3. EXEMPTIONS.
3.1 Renewable energy generation facilities are exempt from this tax.
3.2 Facilities that demonstrate a 25% reduction in carbon emissions may qualify for a 50% tax reduction.

SECTION 4. ENFORCEMENT.
4.1 The State Energy Commission shall enforce the provisions of this Act.
4.2 Facilities shall submit annual capacity reports by January 31 of each year.
4.3 Non-compliance results in penalty of $10,000 per violation.

SECTION 5. EFFECTIVE DATE.
This Act takes effect on January 1, 2025.
